blogs.title: Test Blog 1
blogs.body: I had a similar problem which this approach solved. Although unlike the hard coded products array in this question I was fetching an array of data from a database. Anyway, the idea is that products && products.map(..... is first checking to make sure that products isn't undefined (or has a truthy value at least). If it's undefined, the products.map won't execute
